name: George's Bakery (Demo)
description:
George's Bakery is a 2D clicker game made in Unity in under a week. You bake different pastries from cookies to cakes. Your goal is to make and sell as many cookies as you can. Be careful, in some cases the factory will catch on fire and will lose some cookies. 

CONTROLS: 
* Mouse - Click  What's the Paid Version For? 1. $2.99 - Like the tunes? for only $3, you'll download the soundtrack from the game. A small amount to support the creator.

2. $4.99 - Get the game and the tunes included at NO EXTRA COST! 

3. $12.99 - Get the source code for the ENTIRE game - includes ALL scripts. In addition ALL 3D Assets, 2D Assets and Audio Assets are included for free!
(Note: Source code price is not final. It may change after the final update.) 
Source Code Release Date: 02/11/2021 I can download the source code?

Yes, you can download the entire source code. This includes EVERY script written in C#. Also included is ALL 2D + 3D Assets and ALL Audio Assets at no extra cost. You'll need at least Unity 2017.3 installed to use the source code. You also get to keep it forever! 

Owning the source code means you can create your own version of the game, learn more about game development or even release a modded version too!

Are there any bugs?

There are no game-breaking bugs, as it has been thoroughly tested.
